Calculator - Hide Photo, Video (com.calculator.lock.hide.photo.video)

Brief:

The Calculator app is cleverly designed to function both as a simple calculation tool and a secure vault for hiding your photos and videos. Operating under the guise of a humble calculator, it serves the dual purpose of keeping your media files private and maintaining the regular functionalities of a calculator.
